name: fetchAnyEvents(taskID:query:callbackQueue:completion:)
desc: Fetches all occurrences of a specific task asynchronously from the store. Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func fetchAnyEvents(taskID: String, query: OCKEventQuery, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyEvent]>)
